data.quote: I don't know where I'm going from here, but I promise it won't be boring.
data.author: David Bowie

data.quote: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming.
data.author: David Bowie

data.quote: Failure is a great teacher and, if you are open to it, every mistake has a lesson to offer.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: You can't just sit there and wait for people to give you that golden dream. You've got to get out there and make it happen for yourself.
data.author: Diana Ross

data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucious
